name: Crypto Islands
description: CRYPTO ISLANDS IS A DECENTRALIZED (BSC) PLAY-TO-EARN INDIE GAME, CURRENTLY ON DEVELOPMENT BY A TEAM OF PASSIONATE DEVELOPERS AND ARTISTS. EVERYTHING TAKES PLACE IN A TROPICAL ENVIRONMENT, AN ISLAND CHAIN WITH A BACKDROP OF BEAUTIFUL WATERFALLS AND UNSPOILED NATURE. PLAYERS CAN CHOOSE A VARIETY OF CHARACTERS (REAL-WORLD BASED) AND EARN $GUMA, COLLECTING ASSETS AND NFTS JUST BY PLAYING THE GAME IN SINGLE-PLAYER AND TEAM MODES. IT’S SIMPLE, FUN AND PROFITABLE!
